description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              The Job
              

              - Design, develop and architect a SaaS platform
              
              - Build and maintain a REST API
              
              - Provide mentoring to other developers
              
              - Participate and drive code review sessions
              
              - Recommend improvements to infrastructure, technology and processes
              
              - Prototype experimental features and evaluate new technologies
              
              -  Works closely with members of project teams
              

              Benefit
              

              - 13th salary is paid before Lunar New Year.
              
              - Quarterly review bonus.
              
              - English and IT courses.
              
              - Sport cost for employee (badminton, football, swimming, etc.)
              
              - Overseas/Domestic Company trip, and regular team building activities.
              
              - 15 days annual leaves, working Monday - Friday.
              
              -  Premium health care & insurance programs.
              
              - Annual health check-up.
              
              -  Free parking fee for your bike.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              General:
              

              - Years of experience: at least 2 years
              
              -  Excellent logical thinking ability
              
              -  Ability to work in a team
              
              -  Ability to work under pressure
              
              -  Good problem solving, collaboration, and communication skills
              
              -  Able to work independently with “Can-Do” and “High Responsibility” spirit
              

              Desired Skills:
              

              - Expert knowledge of web development
              
              -  PHP/MySQL web development
              
              -  Proficient OOP, Design Pattern, common framework, REST APIs and SDK development
              
              -  Knowledge of frontend coding, including JS, SASS/SCSS/LESS and responsive web design
              
              -  Experience with relational databases, including schema design and optimization
              
              -  Familiarity with agile development methodologies
              
              -  Familiarity with Amazon Web Services (AWS)
              

              Additional software skills are a plus:
              

              - Experience with dev-ops is a plus
              
              - Fluent speaking/writing english is a plus
              
              - Experience with geographically distributed development teams is a strong plus.
              
              - Experience with frameworks such as Laravel, CakePHP 3 or Symfony a plus
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
